summaries: On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can mine all ores up to Meteorite. It has a 5*1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by Undead Miners, which are uncommon enemies found in the Cavern layer.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it can mine all ores up to Demonite/Crimtane. It has a 2*1/50 (2%) chance of being dropped by Undead Miners.

It is tied with the Silver Pickaxe as the fastest pre-Hardmode pickaxe by mining speed, but has higher pickaxe power equal to that of the Gold Pickaxe, allowing it to mine Meteorite and destroy Dirt Blocks in a single hit. It is the fastest pickaxe for mining weak blocks, such as Dirt and Snow Blocks, until Hardmode, although that function is rendered largely obsolete by the Gravedigger's Shovel.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
